person_say: I'm having problems working with my team and it's delaying our progress. Is there a way to make teamwork smoother?
animal_say: Working with a team can be tough! Can you share what's causing the delays? Is it communication or something else?

person_say: I'm facing challenges in teamwork and unable to finish tasks. I think communication might be a part of it, but there could be other issues as well.
animal_say: It sounds challenging! How do you feel this teamwork issue affects your motivation and the project’s progress?

person_say: The teamwork issue really affects my motivation. It's frustrating when we're not making progress, and I sometimes feel stuck because of it.
animal_say: I hear you! It sounds tough to feel stuck. There’s a busy little bee named Bizy who specializes in teamwork and time management. Want to meet her?

person_say: Yes, meeting Bizy sounds fantastic! I would love to get some tips on improving teamwork and time management.
animal_say: Great choice! Bizy will help you streamline teamwork and boost your motivation. Let’s go see her!
